author: Saheli Roy Choudhury
title: Samsung says its third-quarter profit likely fell 56% from a year earlier
description: Samsung said operating profit for the third quarter is expected at 7.7 trillion Korean won ($6.43 billion), slightly higher than an industry estimate.
content:
Samsung Electronics said on Tuesday that its operating profit for the three months that ended in September likely dropped by more than half from a year ago.
Operating profit for the third quarter is expected at 7.7 trillion Korean won ($6.43 billion), slight… [+233 chars]
